title: Calluna Ligatures – InDesign?
content:
Any idea what's going on here? The ru in 'truly' is now an É with ligatures turned on.

Likely something straightforward. Help appreciated as always.

Thanks

author: stephen_k

comments.content: Looks like a font cache issue. Try clearing your caches.

Hi Frode

Thanks for this. Sorted. :)
